query:
SELECT
                j.id,
                j.url,
                j.routing_key,
                j.status AS "status!: JobStatus",
                j.details AS "details!: serde_json::Value",
                COALESCE(sub_jobs_agg.sub_jobs, '[]'::json) AS "sub_jobs!: Json<Vec<SubJob>>"
            FROM jobs j
            LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
                SELECT JSON_AGG(
                    JSON_BUILD_OBJECT(
                        'id', sj.id,
                        'job_id', sj.job_id,
                        'status', sj.status,
                        'type', sj.type,
                        'details', sj.details,
                        'deadline_at', sj.deadline_at
                    )
                ) AS "sub_jobs"
                FROM sub_jobs sj
                WHERE sj.job_id = j.id
            ) sub_jobs_agg ON TRUE
            WHERE j.id = $1
